author: ghugo83
body:
@boudoul @ianna @venturia  @rovere @ebrondol @VinInn @alkemyst @atricomi @GiacomoSguazzoni 

Added TiltedTracker4025 and 4026.

They both have the following differences with respect to TiltedTracker4021 : 
- TBPS was updated by the Mechanics.
- Layers 3 and 4 of Pixel BPIX have lower radii.
- More accurate Pixel Material Budget description.

Moreover : TiltedTracker4025 has a Forward Pixel with 8+4 Disks (instead of (7+4)).


Technical note : 
- Duplicates in material composites descriptions were avoided. This is internal only and will have no effect.
- As requested, materials such as Cu, Sensi are now prefixed with tkLayout_ (and mentioned in tracker.xml only).
- Geometry/CMSCommonData/python/cmsExtendedGeometry2023D5XML_cfi.py and Geometry/CMSCommonData/python/cmsExtendedGeometry2023D6XML_cfi.py need to be updated with the paths to the XMLs in TiltedTracker4026 and TiltedTracker4025 respectively. This was done locally for testing purposes, but not included in this PR.

A run with 1111 is obtained with both these geometries (though the additional FPIX disk is expected to require adaptations).
title: Added XML descriptions of Phase II Tracker
